data.name: 0000 (285.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That reminds me, Nagato complained about Koizumi earlier. I got a real kick out of it.

data.name: 0001 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yuki complained? I guess strange things happen every now and then.

data.name: 0002 (285.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She was saying it's creepy the way he smiles, and he's way too awful at games and stuff.

data.name: 0003 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Hold on, Yuki really said that?

data.name: 0004 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They're all things that you say about Koizumi, aren't they?

data.name: 0005 (285.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ugh... You caught me, huh.

data.name: 0006 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why would you say Yuki said them? You're absolute scum.

data.name: 0007 (285.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like I made Haruhi mad. I guess I did just recite my own feelings…

data.name: 0008 (285.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hah... hah...

data.name: 0009 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's wrong, Mikuru? Are you already tired?

data.name: 0010 (285.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes…

data.name: 0011 (285.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm always impressed with people like Nagato who never seem to need to complain…

data.name: 0012 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's true, though what if she were just bottling up all of her discontent?

data.name: 0013 (285.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Nagato? ...It doesn't seem like she is.

data.name: 0014 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's exactly why I'm wondering--what if?

data.name: 0015 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yuki seems like the type who would, so we'd be- tter let her get it out of her system sometimes.

data.name: 0016 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Got some rest? Then let's go!

data.name: 0017 (285.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, wait for me~!

data.name: 0018 (285.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I received advice telling me to complain more.

data.name: 0019 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From Kyon?

data.name: 0020 (285.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0021 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, that's very much like him.

data.name: 0022 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But Kyon probably complains too much. What do you think, Yuki?

data.name: 0024 (285.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems despite Nagato's quiet and expressionless nature...

data.name: 0025 (285.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...there's still one person who can understand her subtle expressions.

data.name: 0026 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Is that Kyon you're talking about?

data.name: 0027 (285.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You would be correct. It's just…

data.name: 0028 (285.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Though it seems he intentionally misinterprets her whenever it suits him.

data.name: 0029 (285.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even just earlier he used Nagato as an excuse...

data.name: 0030 (285.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...to justify sharing his opinions.

data.name: 0031 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon would really go that low?

data.name: 0032 (285.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No worries. I'll harshly scold him later!
